Rayman 3: Hoodlum Havoc is an action, adventure and platformer game developed by Ubisoft, Ubisoft Shanghai, Gameloft and Ubi Soft Shanghai. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Gameloft. On review aggregator Metacritic, Rayman 3: Hoodlum Havoc has a score of 73. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". You can play Rayman 3: Hoodlum Havoc on GameCube, Xbox, Classic Macintosh and PC. The game is sold via PlayStation Store, GOG and Xbox 360 Store. Ahmed Boukhelifa produced the game. Fred Leonard, Laurent Parisi and Plume scored the game.

Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege is an action-shooter game developed by Ubisoft, Ubisoft Montreal and Sperasoft. It came out on 01-12-2015. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. On review aggregator Metacritic, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege has a score of 75. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. You can play Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege on Xbox One, PC, PlayStation 4 and Xbox Series S/X. You can purchase the game on Epic Games Store, Xbox Store, PlayStation Store and Steam. Sébastien Labbé produced the game. Xavier Marquis directed the game. It was scored by Ben Frost and Paul Haslinger.

Catwoman is an indie action-adventure game developed by EA UK, Electronic Arts UK and Magic Pockets. It was originally released in 2004. It was published by SakuraGame. Catwoman has a Metascore of 46, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG. You can play Catwoman on Game Boy Advance, PC, PlayStation 2 and Xbox. The game is sold via Steam. It was produced by Simon Harris. It was directed by Andrew Curtis. It was scored by James Hannigan.

Stranger of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin is an action, adventure and RPG game developed by Square Enix, Koei Tecmo and Team NINJA. It was originally released in 2022. It was published by Square Enix. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". Stranger of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin is available on PC, Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and Xbox Series S/X. You can purchase the game on Steam, Xbox Store and Epic Games Store. Fumihiko Yasuda and Jin Fujiwara produced the game. It was directed by Daisuke Inoue, Hiroya Usuda and Nobumichi Kumabe.

Death Horizon: Reloaded is an action-adventure game developed by Horizon Lab LLP. It was originally released in 2023. Horizon Lab LLP published the game. You can play Death Horizon: Reloaded on PC. The game is sold via Steam.

House of Detention is an indie, massively multiplayer, action and adventure game developed by Aniki and Male Union ♂. It came out on 29-05-2020. Dungeon Master published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG. You can play House of Detention on PC, macOS and Linux. You can purchase the game on Steam.

Marvel’s Avengers is an action, adventure and RPG game developed by Crystal Dynamics, Eidos Montreal and Eidos Interactive. It came out on 04-09-2020. It was published by Square Enix. Marvel’s Avengers has a Metascore of 68, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". You can play Marvel’s Avengers on PC, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. You can purchase the game on Steam, Xbox Store and PlayStation Store. It was directed by Shaun Escayg.

Survival: Lost Way is an indie, massively multiplayer, action and adventure game developed by SimplePlan Games. It was originally released in 2021. SimplePlan Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. You can play Survival: Lost Way on PC. The game is sold via Steam.

Nowhere: Mysterious Artifacts is an indie, action, adventure and simulation game developed by EFNSOFT. It came out on 17-08-2023. EFNSOFT published the game. Nowhere: Mysterious Artifacts is available on PC. You can purchase the game on Steam.

Halo Infinite is an action, shooter and adventure game developed by 343 Industries. It came out on 08-12-2021. It was published by Xbox Game Studios. Halo Infinite has a Metascore of 84, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. Halo Infinite is available on Xbox One, PC and Xbox Series S/X. The game is sold via Steam and Xbox Store.

The Dark Pictures Anthology: Little Hope is an action-adventure game developed by Supermassive Games. It came out on 30-10-2020. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. The Dark Pictures Anthology: Little Hope has a Metascore of 70, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". The Dark Pictures Anthology: Little Hope is available on PlayStation 4, PC, Nintendo Switch and Xbox One. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop, Steam, PlayStation Store and Xbox Store. It was directed by Nik Bowen. It was scored by Jason Graves.
